summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 DODGE JOURNEY. THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V273000 (STEERING). THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN AUTHORIZED DEALER (GANLEY CHRYSLER DODGE JEEP RAM ON 310 BROADWAY AVE, BEDFORD, OH 877-639-6813) WHO REFUSED TO REMEDY THE RECALL REPAIR BASED UPON WHERE THE VEHICLE WAS MANUFACTURED. THE CONTACT WAS UNABLE TO DETERMINE IF THE DEALER COULD REPAIR THE VEHICLE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
